name: Chandler Air Service
about: Chandler Air Service, located at Chandler Municipal Airport (KCHD) in Chandler, Arizona, offers a comprehensive range of flight training programs. From private pilot licenses to multi-engine and advanced aerobatics and tailwheel training, our curriculum is designed to meet the diverse needs of aspiring pilots. Our fleet includes aircraft such as the Beechcraft BE-36 and Cessna 172, available for rental. We provide one-on-one and classroom ground school lessons, as well as additional seminars on topics like airplane maintenance and glass cockpit training. With a designated pilot examiner on staff, we ensure a seamless process for checkrides. Our facility is equipped with modern amenities, including a pilot lounge, WiFi, and a restaurant. Known for our friendly and supportive staff, Chandler Air Service is committed to delivering high-quality flight training in a welcoming environment.
